data.eml:eml: On some taxonomically confused species of the genus Amphiesma Duméril, Bibron & Duméril, 1854 related to Amphiesma khasiense (Boulenger, 1890) (Squamata, Natricidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article David, Patrick, Vogel, Gernot, Rooijen, Johan Van (2013): On some taxonomically confused species of the genus Amphiesma Duméril, Bibron & Duméril, 1854 related to Amphiesma khasiense (Boulenger, 1890) (Squamata, Natricidae). Zootaxa 3694 (4): 301-335, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3694.4.1
